casebody.data:
Bonham et al., Appellants, v. City of Hamilton, Appellee.

[Cite as Bonham, v. Hamilton, 116 Ohio St.3d 1222, 2007-Ohio-6748.]

(No. 2007-0459 Submitted November 28, 2007 Decided December 20, 2007.) John W. Uhl, for appellants. Millikin & Fitton Law Firm, Michael A. Fulton, and Steven A. Tooman, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently accepted.

Moyer, C.J., and Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J., dissents. O’Donnell, J., not participating.
